message: Windows Identity Foundation ... Windows Identity Foundation?

data.message: No one use this anymore, actually i don't think it picked up in the first place with the rise of stuff like OpenID back then and after that Facebook and Twitter.

To the OP, I don't know what is the question, whether there is a question at all, but I "think" that most WIF questions, especially getting-started ones, especially .NET 4.0/4.5 questions, often end up with this as an answer http://thinktecture.github.io/
